data.extraActivity: My name is Vishal Prakash Maurya, I’m 21 years old and I completed my graduation from Babu Banarasi Das National Institute of Technology and Management with a B.tech in Computer Science. While there, I learning a lot of practical in subjects like fundamentals of new technologies, machine learning, web development and more.
